definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: associate (OAram. id, Lzb:298 SAC:65; S-C:B 6; Syr. knot; Chr-Pal. [kn0, knt] Schwally:Idiot. 46 Schulth:Lex. 93; √ appar. [[כנח]] K:§ 56, a) b 2 M:§ 74 c; Buhl makes loan-wd. from As. kinâtu, ‘Genosse,’ but v. Dl:WB 338 Zim:M.p. 66 *);—associate, pl. sf. [[כְּבָוָתֵהּ]] Ezr 5:6, [[תְהוֹן]]- Ezr 4:9, Ezr 4:17, Ezr 4:23, Ezr 5:3, Ezr 6:6, Ezr 6:13.
